content: I think I want to use the long road metaphor. I like the idea of describing the journey of perseverance as a path filled with obstacles, and I think it could be really powerful to convey the emotions of struggle and determination. I was thinking of using the line "I've been walking this road for miles, with every step, I feel the weight of my trials" as a starting point. Do you have any suggestions on how to develop this idea further?
